channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Sterling File Gateway
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Sterling File Gateway

item.title: CVE-2021-20485|2024-09-17T02:00:37.438Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0.0 through 6.1.0.3 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 197667.

item.title: CVE-2018-1563|2024-09-17T03:07:54.613Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition (IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0 through 2.2.6) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 142967.

item.title: CVE-2017-1548|2024-09-17T03:38:40.460Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2 could allow a remote attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to view arbitrary files on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 131288.

item.title: CVE-2020-4476|2024-09-17T02:41:59.957Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0.0 through 2.2.6.5 and 6.0.0.0 through 6.0.3.2 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 181778.

item.title: CVE-2017-1550|2024-09-17T02:52:08.734Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2 could allow an authenticated user to change other user's passwords. IBM X-Force ID: 131290.

item.title: CVE-2019-4280|2024-09-17T03:12:33.328Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0.0 through 6.0.1.0 displays sensitive information in HTTP requests which could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 160503.

item.title: CVE-2021-20584|2024-09-17T01:05:39.459Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0.0 through 6.1.1.0 could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by improper access controls. IBM X-Force ID: 199397.

item.title: CVE-2017-1544|2024-09-17T00:06:37.021Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling B2B Integrator Standard Edition (IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0 through 2.2.6) caches usernames and passwords in browsers that could be used by a local attacker to obtain sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 130812.

item.title: CVE-2021-20376|2024-09-17T03:38:21.912Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 2.2.0.0 through 6.1.1.0 could allow an authenticated attacker to enumerate usernames due to there being an observable discrepancy in returned messages. IBM X-Force ID: 195568.

item.title: CVE-2023-47714|2024-06-04T17:26:44.843Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 6.0.0.0 through 6.0.3.9, 6.1.0.0 through 6.1.2.3, and 6.2.0.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 271531.

item.title: CVE-2023-47714|2024-08-02T21:16:43.653Z -- ibm -- sterling%20file%20gateway
item.description: IBM Sterling File Gateway 6.0.0.0 through 6.0.3.9, 6.1.0.0 through 6.1.2.3, and 6.2.0.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 271531.
